title: ReactJS Lead
description:
Qualifications

7+ years of front-end JavaScript experience

5+ years of React experience, with a strong portfolio

In-depth knowledge of React.js and its core principles

Experience with backend libraries such as Express and familiarity with Node.js

Experience with state management libraries such as Redux

Familiarity with RESTful APIs and modern front-end build pipelines and tools

Strong understanding of web performance and optimization techniques

Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment

Familiarity with UI/UX design principles

Responsibilities

Design and implement user interfaces using React.js best practices

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features

Write well-structured, efficient, and maintainable code

Mentor and guide junior developers

Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality standards

Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies
